akas: Jill & Jessa: Counting On USA (first season title)
akas from release info: Jill & Jessa: Counting On USA (first season title)

1.title: Love Is in the Air
1.plot: With the due date near, Jinger and Jeremy get ready to meet baby Vuolo; John whisks Abbie away on a surprise trip to ask for her hand in marriage; Jinger's labor takes an unexpected turn.

1.title: A New Chapter
1.plot: It was supposed to be the happiest time in Jill & Jessa's lives. But when devastating news about older brother Josh was revealed, the sisters' worlds were shattered. Jill & Jessa share how the last several months have changed their lives forever.

2.title: Baby Shower & a New Home
2.plot: Over the last few months Jill and Jessa grew even closer as sisters as they walked through this difficult time together. Now, just a couple of weeks away from Jessa's due date, Jill and Derick leave for their new lives in Central America.

3.title: Counting One More
3.plot: Jessa is just a few days away from her due date and while they may be miles apart, Jill and Jessa are both going through life changes and new beginnings. Jessa and Ben have dinner with family friends who have gone through the process of adopting.

1.title: At Home and Away
1.plot: Jessa and Ben navigate life as a family of three with new baby, Spurgeon. Jill and Derick settle into their home in Central America as Israel starts to hit new milestones. Later, Jessa enlists her sisters to help prepare a fall feast for the whole family.

2.title: Date Nights & Bright Lights
2.plot: Jana and Jessa embark on a large DIY lighting project while the rest of the family travels to Central America. Then Jessa and Ben go on their first date since Spurgeon was born, will his presence wreck the romance?

3.title: Jinger Flips
3.plot: Jessa goes out for coffee with Jana and Anna, leaving Ben in charge of Spurgeon. Jinger buys a car at auction with the intention of flipping while Jana starts a new project with her brothers. Jill and Derick introduce Israel to their love of pickles.

4.title: Surprise!
4.plot: The siblings continue construction on their treehouse, which gets bigger and bigger. Joy and Sierra plan a secret baby shower, but worry about pulling off the surprise. Jill and Derick have surprise guests in Central America.

5.title: Ben Drops Beats
5.plot: The siblings continue work on the family treehouse, but the cold weather hinders their efforts. Later, Ben and Jessa travel to St. Louis to meet with Christian hip-hop artist, Flame and learn about his work. Inspired, Ben steps into the recording booth

6.title: Girls Hit the Road
6.plot: After weeks of work the treehouse is ready for a big reveal! Then the girls hit the road for a weekend away, but a surprise on the way leads to an unexpected detour. Once at their destination, the girls enjoy quality time together and lots of girl talk.

7.title: Family Reunion
7.plot: Jessa, Ben, and Spurgeon travel to Central America to visit Jill, Derick and Israel. As they prepare for the trip, they travel down memory lane, revisiting Jessa's milestone moments, from engagement to motherhood, that have led to this emotional reunion.

8.title: Israel Meets Spurgeon
8.plot: Jessa and Ben experience what life is like for Jill and Derick while living in a foreign country with a young son. Jill and Derick remember their beginnings together in Nepal and the adventures that have led them to the mission field in Central America.

11.title: Duggars at the Altar
11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: A Courtship Begins
1.plot: On the season premiere of Counting On, Jessa and Ben discuss future additions to their growing family as Jill and Derick face hardships while continuing mission work in Central America. Jinger gets ready to take a big step with a special someone!

2.title: It's Official!
2.plot: Jinger brings Jeremy over for his first meal with the family. The couple makes a call to Jill and Derick for some courtship advice. Ben and Jessa discuss his plan for youth outreach. Later, the older siblings participate in wilderness survival training.

3.title: Duggars in the Wild
3.plot: After a scary encounter with a nighttime visitor, the Duggar siblings continue their wilderness training. Jill and Derick celebrate their second anniversary with some creature comforts, and Jessa and Ben marvel at how quickly their baby is growing up!

4.title: Meet the Parents
4.plot: Jinger, accompanied by Jim Bob and Michelle, heads to Laredo, TX to meet Jeremy's parents for the first time. Will she meet with their approval? Meanwhile, back home, Joy gets her first flying lesson and Jana plans a graduation party for 3 siblings.

5.title: A Big Surprise
5.plot: Jeremy makes a secret trip to Arkansas, but before surprising Jinger, he and Ben do some browsing for engagement rings. Then, Jessa and Ben give their rapper friend, Flame, a taste of Duggar family life.

6.title: The Big Event
6.plot: Ben prepares to have a Football camp with college and pro players coaching. Jinger travels to the East Coast to meet Jeremy's family. Jana is redecorating the Duggar guesthouse.

7.title: Guys' Guide to Courtship
7.plot: Jinger, Jeremy, and chaperones go on a whirlwind trip to see his family and friends. Will delayed flights ruin a big surprise Jeremy has planned? And we take a look back at past Duggar courtships and hear the guys' tips for a successful relationship.

8.title: Proposal in the the City
8.plot: Jinger, Michelle, Jessa, Ben and Spurgeon are all in the northeast meeting some of Jeremy's family & friends and visiting his old stomping grounds. Little does Jinger know, Jeremy has an important question he plans to ask before the trip is over!

9.title: Jessa's Announcement
9.plot: Jinger and Jeremy celebrate their engagement in NYC. Meanwhile, Jill and Derick wrap up their mission work in Central America and are greeted with a big surprise party in Arkansas, but in the end, Jessa and Ben have an even bigger surprise of their own.

10.title: The After Show
10.plot: The family comes together to relive some of the most memorable moments from season 2. Plus, before the reunion is over, there is a surprise guest in store for the cast.

11.title: Courting Jinger
11.plot: The big day is almost here! Count down to Jinger's wedding with a look back at the special place she's held in the Duggar household.

12.title: Jinger Gets Married
12.plot: After months of anticipation, Jinger and Jeremy's wedding day has finally arrived! Take a first look at this special day as Jinger walks down the aisle to become Mrs. Jeremy Vuolo.

1.title: The Jinger Gown
1.plot: Jinger said yes to marrying Jeremy and now it's time to start planning for the big day, which is just 3 months away! The family takes a trip to DC to find Jinger's perfect dress. But with more options than imagined, will she find the dress of her dreams?

2.title: Could it be Twins?
2.plot: Jessa and Ben listen to the heartbeat of Baby #2, which makes them wonder if it's twins. They travel to see friend Flame in concert, and Ben takes center stage. Jinger continues with wedding planning and finalizes important details.

3.title: Bachelor Pad Makeover
3.plot: Jinger and some of her siblings travel to Laredo to give Jeremy's bachelor pad a makeover. When opinions clash, will they be able to come to a decorating decision? Derick, Jill and Israel get some surprising news at their family wellness check-up.

4.title: The Bachelor Party
4.plot: After weeks of wedding planning, it's time to celebrate Jinger and Jeremy with a Bachelor and Bachelorette weekend full of friends and family. Jessa and Ben find out the gender of Baby #2. Derick returns to OSU to reprise his role as Pistol Pete.

5.title: All About Jinger
5.plot: Jinger packs for her move to Texas, which includes a surprise gift from her family. She, Jeremy, and Jed drive to her future home in Laredo. As they anticipate her big move, the siblings take a trip down memory lane remembering Jinger through the years.

6.title: The Big Day
6.plot: After months of planning, Jinger's wedding day is here! The final details from dress fittings to surprise decorations are put into place and family and friends come together to celebrate Jinger and Jeremy as they become Mr. and Mrs. Vuolo.

7.title: A Honeymoon and a Courtship
7.plot: Jinger and Jeremy have said "I do," and now the newlyweds finally get to enjoy some alone time. Mr. and Mrs. Vuolo head down under for their honeymoon in Australia. Meanwhile, back in Arkansas, another Duggar enters a courtship.

1.title: Joy's Wedding
1.plot: It's hard to believe that Joy and Austin's wedding day is finally here! Get a first look at this exciting and emotional event as Joy walks down the aisle to become Mrs. Austin Forsyth. Then, another Duggar has a surprise that leaves guests shocked.

2.title: Triple Date Night
2.plot: Ben, Derick and Austin enjoy an afternoon at a trampoline park while Jessa, Jill and Joy shop for the perfect date night outfit. Jill and Derick share some big news with Israel. Meanwhile in Laredo, Jinger and Jeremy settle into married life.

3.title: Spurgeon's First Birthday
3.plot: Joy and Austin work together on a house flipping project, and the family celebrates Spurgeon's first birthday. And in Laredo, things heat up in the kitchen with Jinger and Jeremy.

4.title: A New Baby
4.plot: As Jessa's due date inches closer, family and friends help the Seewalds prepare for the new baby. Joy and Austin continue working on their house flipping project, and Austin asks Jim Bob an important question. Later, Jessa and Ben welcome their 2nd child.

5.title: A Boy or Girl for Jill?
5.plot: The Seewalds are adjusting to being a family of four. In Laredo, Jinger and Jeremy learn Spanish and test their skills at a local restaurant. Meanwhile, Joy enjoys dinner with Austin's family. Then the Dillards reveal the gender of baby number two!

6.title: Joy Gets Engaged
6.plot: The Dillards prepare for their return to Central America. Jinger puts together a care package for her family back in Arkansas. Austin asks Joy a very important question, and Joe asks for permission to ask Kendra Caldwell to enter into a courtship.

7.title: The After Show Part 1
7.plot: In part one of the two-part After Show Special, host Daphne Oz digs a little deeper into some of last season's biggest moments. From courtships to weddings to babies, we cover it all and get some insight into what was going on behind the scenes!

8.title: The After Show Part 2
8.plot: In part two of the two-part After Show Special, host Daphne Oz gets the Duggars' reactions to some of the biggest moments of last season. The happy couples square off in a fun game of "The Couples Showdown." And stay tuned for a special guest or two.

1.title: A New Courtship
1.plot: The Seewalds and the Vuolos meet up in San Antonio and take a stroll down memory lane. Joy begins her wedding planning with a walkthrough of the venue. The Dillards get settled in Central America. And Joe asks Kendra an important question.

2.title: Let Them Eat Cake
2.plot: Wedding planning continues as Joy shops for bridesmaids dresses and tastes cakes with Austin. Joe and Kendra enjoy a rollerblading date. The Vuolos take a cooking class together in Laredo. And renovations begin on Joy and Austin's house.

3.title: Finding Joy's Dress
3.plot: Joy travels to Kentucky to find her perfect wedding dress, but with so many options, the overwhelmed bride has to make some big decisions. Austin and Joe enjoy some bonding time with their future father-in-laws. And Israel celebrates his 2nd birthday!

4.title: Joy and Austin's Camping Trip
4.plot: Joy and Kendra visit a salon to get some hairstyle ideas for Joy's wedding. Joy and Austin celebrate their Bachelor & Bachelorette weekend with afun camping trip. And Jinger and Jeremy do some shopping for Joy and Austin's rehearsal dinner.

5.title: Tomboy Joy
5.plot: Joy and Austin's wedding day is almost here, so Joy's siblings prepare some special gifts for the happy couple and take a trip down memory lane remembering Joy through the years.

6.title: Joy and Austin Tie the Knot
6.plot: Joy's wedding day is finally here! After months of planning, the final touches are added as family and friends come together to celebrate Joy & Austin becoming Mr. & Mrs. Forsyth.

1.title: In Love in Switzerland
1.plot: Newlyweds, Mr and Mrs Forsyth finally get to enjoy some alone time in Switzerland. Meanwhile, Joe and Kendra have their engagement pictures taken.

2.title: The Vuolos Buy a House
2.plot: The siblings help Jinger and Jeremy move out of their apartment and into their new house; Joe and Kendra enjoy playing disc golf with the Caldwells; Joy and Austin settle into married life and help out at Ft. Rock Family Camp.

3.title: Spurgeon's First Haircut
3.plot: Joe and Kendra get started on wedding plans and pick out the groomsmen's outfits; after two years, Jessa and Ben finally give their son Spurgeon a haircut.

4.title: Kendra's Birthday Surprise
4.plot: Jinger and Jeremy play host to their friends from NYC; on Kendra's birthday, she heads to Kentucky to pick out her wedding dress, but Joe has a big birthday surprise up his sleeve.

5.title: A New Bundle of Joy
5.plot: Joe and Kendra have a joint bachelor and bachelorette party on a lake with family and friends; Jinger and Jeremy decide to take a shot at coffee roasting; Joy and Austin have some big news to share with the family.

6.title: Joy Gives Birth
6.plot: Joy prepares to welcome her first child as her due date approaches; with Austin by her side, Joy goes into labor and gives birth to their baby.

7.title: Joe and Kendra Say I Do
7.plot: The time has finally come for Joe and Kendra to say I do; there are emotional moments with family and friends as they prepare for their wedding day; when the ceremony begins, a few surprises and mishaps make sure it's a day they won't forget.

1.title: It's All Greek to Me
1.plot: In this first look at Josiah and Lauren's wedding, the bride and groom say their I do's and have their first kiss, then wind back six months earlier to the beginning of their courtship; Joe and Kendra go on their honeymoon in Greece.

2.title: Make Room for Baby
2.plot: Joy and Austin check in on baby Forsyth at their midwife appointment; Jinger and Jeremy window-shop for a new piano; Joe and Kendra move into their new home and have a special reveal for the family.

3.title: Jinger and Jeremy's Little Secret
3.plot: Jessa and Ben visit a creamery with the kids; Joy and Austin go on a baby moon before their baby arrives; Jinger and Jeremy visit Arkansas and have a special announcement for the family.

4.title: Unexpected
4.plot: Joe and Kendra check up on their baby; the little girls record an album; Josiah takes Lauren's siblings out for ice cream; Jeremy and Jinger reveal some unexpected news.

5.title: An Explosive Reveal
5.plot: Jinger and Jeremy celebrate their first anniversary, and Jeremy has a very special surprise for her; Josiah is ready to take the next step and seeks the blessing of Lauren's dad; Joe and Kendra reveal the gender of their baby in a very explosive way.

6.title: Josiah Pops the Question
6.plot: Jinger and Jeremy's good friends come for a visit, and the expecting couple has a trial run at parenthood; they must figure out how to manage three kids under five without any meltdowns; Josiah travels to Georgia to propose to Lauren.

7.title: A Birth-day and a Birthday
7.plot: The three pregnant sisters are reunited for a big family birthday; Joy goes into labor, and after 20 hours, she is transported to the hospital for an emergency C-section.

8.title: Thrift Store Date Night
8.plot: Three couples go on a thrift store date night and choose outfits for their partners to wear; new mom Joy and pregnant Kendra have a joint Sip and See party.

9.title: Lauren Finds Her Dress
9.plot: The Duggars celebrate Jana and John David's 28th birthday with a family ski trip; Jinger and Jeremy tour a birth center and find out the gender of their baby; Lauren goes shopping for the perfect wedding gown.

10.title: Jinger's Double Surprise
10.plot: Jinger and Jeremy throw a gender reveal party for the family and the family has a surprise of their own for Jinger; Josiah and Lauren celebrate their upcoming wedding with a game of giant foosball; Joe and Kendra welcome their baby boy.

11.title: Josiah & Lauren's Prank-less Wedding?
11.plot: It's Josiah and Lauren's wedding day and the happy couple is eager to walk down the aisle and finally share their first kiss; with Josiah being the family prankster and the brothers out for revenge, the couple prepares for some shenanigans.

imdb.title: Jill & Jessa Counting On
plot: The focus is on the family's older children as they celebrate some of life's milestone moments, including big moves, the realities of growing up, and raising their own families.
